com.sun.xacml.cond
Class MatchFunction

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.xacml.cond.FunctionBase
      com.sun.xacml.cond.MatchFunction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Expression, Function
public class MatchFunction
extends FunctionBase

Implements the standard matching and regular expression functions.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Seth Proctor, Yassir Elley

NAME_STRING_REGEXP_MATCH

public static final java.lang.String NAME_STRING_REGEXP_MATCH
Standard identifier for the string-regexp-match function. NOTE: this in the 1.0 namespace right now because of a bug in the XACML 2.0 specification, but this will be changed to the 2.0 namespace as soon as the errata is recognized.
